TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SamlAuthorityBinding extends System.Object

summary.span: 指定如何检索关于 安全令牌主题的附加信息。

span.span: Specifies how to retrieve additional information about the subject of a security token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类可指定如何检索关于 安全令牌内已验证主题的附加信息。Use the class to specify how to retrieve additional information about an authenticated subject within a security token. 安全令牌使用 SAML 断言指定其声明，这些断言可指定何时对主题进行身份验证。 security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions, which can specify when the subject was authenticated. SAML 断言中的声明由 SAML 语句表示。The claims in a SAML assertion are represented by SAML statements. SAML 规范定义了一组 SAML 语句类型，其中一个类型为 。The SAML specification defines a set of SAML statement types and one of them is a . 一个 ，它断言在特定时间以特定方式对语句的主题进行身份验证。An asserts that the statement's subject was authenticated by a particular means at a particular time. 还有一个可选的 ，它指定如何检索已验证主题的附加信息。An also has an optional , which specifies how to retrieve additional information about an authenticated subject. 使用 、 和 属性可检索已验证主题的附加信息。Use the , , and properties to retrieve additional information about an authenticated subject.
